metadata.title: GreenCircle — Community Waste & Sustainability
metadata.description: Understand, monitor, and improve waste management in your local community.

guides.title: Sorting guides
guides.description: Quick reference for what goes where. Avoid contamination fines by sorting correctly.

generalWaste.title: General waste
generalWaste.description: What goes in your red lid bin. No recyclables, no food scraps, no hazardous items.

recycling.title: Recycling
recycling.description: Clean paper, cardboard, plastic bottles, glass, steel, aluminium. Rinse and flatten.

greenWaste.title: Green waste
greenWaste.description: Garden clippings, leaves, small branches. No plastic bags or soil.

foodScraps.title: Food scraps
foodScraps.description: Compostable organics. Use council-approved caddy liners or newspaper.

bulkyItems.title: Bulky items
bulkyItems.description: Furniture, mattresses, whitegoods. Book a collection or take to the tip.

hazardousWaste.title: Hazardous waste
hazardousWaste.description: Batteries, chemicals, paint, pesticides, fluorescent bulbs. Never in kerbside bins. Use council drop-off or hazardous waste collection.

eWaste.title: E-waste
eWaste.description: Phones, computers, TVs, cables, small appliances. Take to e-waste drop-off or book a collection. Data wiped at facilities.

textiles.title: Textiles
textiles.description: Clothing, towels, sheets, shoes. Donate if usable, or use charity bins. No wet or contaminated items.

about.title: About GreenCircle
about.para1: GreenCircle helps local community members understand, monitor, and improve waste management practices. We blend educational content, gamified participation, and actionable workflows for residents and council administrators.
about.para2: The platform supports booking bulky pickups, reporting contamination or missed services, joining community challenges, and staying informed with local announcements—even with limited connectivity.
